OrgName.entry: 101 - REPORTING NON-EMERGENCY CRIMES AND ANTI-SOCIAL BEHAVIOUR

Desc.entry: A 24 hour telephone number provided by Sheffield City Council and South Yorkshire Police to deal with non-emergency crime, community safety and anti-social behavior issues. The phone line can also be used to report problems concerning: vandalism and graffiti, noise nuisance , threatening behavior, abandoned vehicles, dumping and fly tipping, drunk and rowdy groups, drug related anti-social behavior and broken street lighting.
